marquee.a: The Commodore Perry School District school buildings are closed for the remainder of the year; however, our students are still engaged in learning!

div.h5: Vision Statement – The vision of the Commodore Perry School District is to empower entrepreneurial-minded educators to prepare and graduate innovative students who are critical thinkers, problem solvers, leaders, net-workers, collaborators, and effective communicators who access and analyze information to thrive in a challenging and ever-changing global marketplace. Mission Statement The mission of the Commodore Perry School District is to provide every student with a unique education that is inspiring, engaging, rigorous, and relevant in a culture of high expectations, excellence, and respect for all, supported by and in partnership with the community.

ul.li: Is met at his/her learning level
Is provided a variety of learning opportunities that meet his/her needs, inspire passion, and unlock potential for growth
Understands the current and future relevance of skills and concepts that he/she is learning
Is challenged and empowered to take risks

p.img: —- “The online parent portal for student grades is now available for parents of students in grades 7-12. If you would like to sign up for the portal, please send an email message containing your preferred email address and the name of your child to Mrs. Shook at tshook@cppanthers.org with the subject line parent portal. You will then receive an email containing a link and the steps for setting up your parent portal account. ” Online parent portal for student grades

div.p: Commodore Perry now we sing, Highest tribute to thee we bring. Gratefully we sing thy praise, As our voices now we raise. Glory, honor, all for thee, Truth, fidelity. Wisdom, courage, loyalty, Hail to thee, hail to thee.
